channel.title: DTO
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from DTO, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: S&P 500 flirts with correction as Trump’s trade war escalates. What comes next?

item.title: Newsmax paid $40 million to settle defamation suit over 2020 election claims

item.title: U.S. Postal Service will cut workforce by 10,000 after signing deal with Elon Musk's DOGE
item.description: Postmaster General Louis DeJoy told Congress he signed an agreement with Elon Musk's DOGE to help the money-losing agency address "big problems."
